text2image.title: ByteText-to-Image Online
text2image.description: A modern text-to-image generation tool with multiple templates and styles. Built using Next.js 14 and TypeScript, supporting dark mode and i18n.

tool-site.title: Byte Tools Navigation Site
tool-site.description: A navigation website featuring hundreds of practical tools from China and abroad, including efficiency tools, AI tools, learning tools, development tools, audio resources, video resources, design tools, and creative tools.

blog.title: blog
blog.description: A blog documenting the growth journey of an independent developer, including daily life, technical sharing, and project experiences.

online-tool.title: Byte Online Tools Site
online-tool.description: An online tool site specifically built for developers, containing various practical tools such as code formatting, online translation, time conversion, and more.
